title: Mexico : religion affiliation share 2018 , by type
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Catholic and lowest at Response Baptist evangelist.
There is a difference of 80.7 between the maximum Response Catholic and minimum Response Baptist evangelist.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 80.8 is found at Response Catholic and the minimum is found at Baptist evangelist where Response is 0.1.
There is a difference of 80.7 between the maximum Response Catholic and minimum Response Baptist evangelist.

Response Catholic is higher than any other Responses with value 80.8, followed by , and Believer without formal affiliation to any religion. Down to Response Baptist evangelist with the lowest value 0.1.
Response Adventist, Mormon, Agnostic, and Atheist have the same Share of respondents.
The Response Catholic has 11.31 times more Share of respondents than average.
